import { useContext } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { AppContext } from './context/appContext'; export const MoodItem = props => { const { item, color } = props const { getPlaylistTracks, setFound } = useContext(AppContext) return item.owner ?
setFound(item)} className={`rounded text-xs mb-2 bg-${color}-500 text-cyan-50 p-1`}>

getPlaylistTracks(item.id)} className={`text-cyan-50 text-lg bg-${color}-700 p-1 rounded`}> {item.name}
